backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON metadata describing all frontend components, including the main App, Header with navigation, HomePage orchestrating sections, HeroSection, ProductCategorySection, ProductCard with hover effects, Footer, product data with mice/keyboards/monitors/PC builds, and styling configurations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, including neon accent colors and design system tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app into a root div and references the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders Header, HomePage, and Footer in a flex layout structure.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with brand info, category navigation links with smooth scrolling, social media icons, copyright notice, and Caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with Spyderstild logo, desktop/mobile navigation menus for product categories (Mice, Keyboards, Monitors, PC Builds), and smooth scroll functionality.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with background image, animated neon gradient title, tagline, CTA button with smooth scroll, and geometric decorative elements.
frontend/src/components/HomePage.tsx: Main page component that renders HeroSection followed by four ProductCategorySection components for mice, keyboards, monitors, and PC builds with their respective data and accent colors.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Reusable product card with hover effects, neon borders, conditional background images for Hacking PC (hacker face) and Gaming PC (spider), product specs list, and support for four accent colors.
frontend/src/components/ProductCategoryS: React component that renders a product category section with a title, description, banner image, and a grid of product cards, supporting different accent colors for theming.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines the Product interface and exports arrays of product data for mice, keyboards, monitors, and PC builds with names, descriptions, icons, and specifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an actor instance for backend communication, handling both authenticated and anonymous states based on Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for React Query hooks to interact with the backend; currently unused as the site is static.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file importing fonts, Tailwind directives, defining CSS custom properties for dark theme colors including neon accent colors, and custom scrollbar and clip-path utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors (including neon variants), fonts (Orbitron, Rajdhani, Inter), animations, and plugins for the gaming hardware site theme.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking feature requests to add Viper Elite gaming mouse to the products catalog, with pending status for implementation.
